correspAction.name: Johann Georg Mertens and Anna Mertens

head.supplied: Dedicated with gratitude to my deeply loved grandparents ¶ on the happy occasion of their Golden Wedding Anniversary ¶ Tönning, 28 April 1843. ¶ O guide me with your leading hand ¶ You sweet genius of...

div.p: To Johann Georg Mertens and Anna Mertens
RB MSS M101, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: B43.04.01. Meinen hochgeliebten Grosseltern bei der frohen Feier

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: ihrer goldenen Hochzeit voll Dankbarkeit zugeeignet

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Tönning, am 28sten April 1843.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: O, leite mich mit deinen Führerwinken

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Du holder Genius der Poesie!

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Gekettet lass in meine Seele sinken

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ein feurig Wort mit deiner Harmonie!

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Wo sich empfindungsvoll die Wünsche reihen,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ergreift die Sprache deinen Zauberton;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Wo Freundschaft herrscht, da kann nur Freundschaft weihen,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Denn näh're Bande fordern Liebe schon.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ihr fordert sie; drum bei der schönsten Feier

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Nehmt meinen Jubel, meine Wünsche hin,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ich leih sie zagernd meiner stillen Leier,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ihr der Gefühle laut'sten Künd'gerin.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: So wie dem Säugling schützend sich beflügeln

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Die Engel auf der ros'gen Bahn,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: So wolle sich die Zukunft Euch entsiegeln,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und freundlich die verschleierte Euch nahn.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ein halb' Jahrhundert birgt in seinen Nächten,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: In rauher Schickung manchen Trauertag;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Doch, wunderbar dem Dunkel sich verflechtend,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Folgt lichter nur des Glückes Sonne nach.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Wo jene Euch im Bunde dann ereilten,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Da trägt der Mensch vereint ein leichtes Joch;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und wenn des Glückes helle Sterne weilten,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Dann glänzten theilend sie Euch goldner noch.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und was sie je Erfreuliches Euch brachten,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und was das Leben herrliches Euch barg,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und was, wenn kurz die Augenblicke lachten,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Sie jemals sandten Göttliches Euch karg,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Entfalte neu sich, fess'le aus dem Rausche

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Der Gegenwart für Euch ein dauernd Glück,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und bringe bei der Zeiten schnellem Tausche

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Noch viele Jahre freudig Euch zurück!

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und das Bewusstsein, jeder Edle windet

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Still eine Blume in den Feierkranz,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Dies wonnige, dies stolze Wissen bindet

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Erhöhend sich an uns'res Festes Glanz.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Es ist ein Talisman, der treu verpfändend

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Dem Ehrentage seine Schönheit leiht,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Und, wunderbar Euch seine Segnung spendend,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ein später Lohn für deutsche Biederkeit!

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ferdinand Müller.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Tönning, 1843.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Gedruckt bei C. H. Andersen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Dedicated with gratitude to my deeply loved grandparents

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: on the happy occasion of their Golden Wedding Anniversary

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: Tönning, 28 April 1843.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: O guide me with your leading hand

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: You sweet genius of poetry.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Let sink deep into my soul

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: A passionate word of your harmony.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Where good wishes unite in full emotion,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Your magic impregnates the spoken word.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Where friendship rules, friendship only can bless.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: For, closer links already ask for love.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: You ask for love. Hence at the fairest festival

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Accept my jubilations, my best wishes.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I hand them hesitatingly over to my quiet lyre,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: To her who speaks loudest of my feelings.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Like angels' wings protect the infant

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: In the rosy days of its early life

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Thus might the future reveal itself to you.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Graciously might approach you the veiled one.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Half a century includes in its nights

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Many sorrowful days brought about by hard fate.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: However, there follows miraculously interwoven with the darkness

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Only brighter the sun of happiness.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: When the former seized you, both together,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Man, united, carries an easy yoke.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: But when Goood Fortune's bright stars were shining

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: They had an even brighter golden glance when you shared them.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: All the delightful they brought to you,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: All the glorious, life had for you,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: All the divine of short moments,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: All that may unfold itself to you anew.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: May turn the frenzy of the present into everlasting happiness,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: May bring you many happy years in these quick-changing times.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: The knowledge that every noble man

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Quietly winds a flower into the festival wreath,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: This delightful, this proud knowledge,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Enhances the brightness of our festival.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: It is a token which plighting faithfulness

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Adds beauty to the day of honour,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: And is, wonderfully blessing you,

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: A late reward for German integrity.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Ferdinand Müller.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: Tönning, 1843.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0.8335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Printed by C. H. Andersen.
Translation of poem from M. Willis (1949).
